title: Chroma RGB SDK
description: Unleash the Power of Immersion: Integrate Chroma RGB and elevate your game and applications!
longDescription:
Add Chroma RGB lighting to your game using either C++ or Blueprints with this plugin. Chroma SDK unlocks a world of dynamic lighting effects for your games & applications. It acts as a bridge between your game and Chroma enabled hardware, allowing developers to have complete control over individual LEDs on the hardware. Imagine keyboards that pulse with health bars, mice that glow during combat, or entire setups that react to in-game events. With Chroma SDK, you will be able to create a truly immersive experience. 


Compatibility


  • Compatible with over 100 million devices in the world with over 50 brands (Razer, Philips Hue, Nanoleaf, Govee, MSI & more) directly integrated into the ecosystem.
  • Compatible with Windows 11 - Windows Dynamic Lighting partners
  • Logitech
  • Acer
  • SteelSeries
  • HP
  • ASUS ROG


Platforms:

  • Windows


QUICK START:

Chroma can be included through premade Chroma Animations or APIs. Here is the list of available methods:

  • Initialize SDK: Initialize the Chroma SDK to use the library.
  • Is Active: Check if the app/game has Chroma focus.
  • Is Connected: Check if Chroma hardware is connected.
  • Play Chroma Animation: Playback a Chroma Animation asset.
  • Set Event Name: Name a game event or game trigger in order to also add Haptics to the Chroma event.
  • Use Forward Chroma Events: Toggle automatic invocation of SetEventName when invoking PlayAnimation using the animation name.


Access Documentation:

For comprehensive guidance and in-depth information on utilizing the Chroma SDK for Unreal Engine, consult our official documentation at Chroma Unreal Engine SDK Documentation. Here, you'll find all the resources you need to create the immersive lighting effects in your projects.


Testing:

Device emulators are available for you to try out the SDK

Alternatively, register your products on our official website to request for a set of devices for integration.


Web Chroma Editor:

An editor for developers to record Chroma animations using web cam, desktop capture, images, and video sources. Editor allows you to generate embedded Chroma animations in source code for various programming languages.


Chroma Design Converter:

Automates porting Chroma designs to several languages and engines across various platforms


CChromaEditorLibrary.DLL:

C++ library that extends the core Chroma SDK with animation manipulation and playback support. This also includes a standalone C++ GUI editor for inspecting and hand editing animations.


Join Our Community:

Should you require assistance, seek guidance, or simply wish to engage in discussions about the immersive lighting effects, we invite you to join our vibrant community on Discord. Connect with fellow creators, developers, and RGB lighting enthusiasts via the following link: Discord Community. Together, we'll light up the world of gamers.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Access the Chroma API through C++ or Blueprints for Windows. 
  • C++ API controls Chroma hardware lighting for ChromaLink, Headsets, Keyboards, Keypads, Mouse, and Mousepads.
  • Blueprint Library for easy access to the Chroma SDK API. 
  • Sample Chromatic Level to showcase automatic Chroma to Sensa events 
  • Sample App Level with corresponding animations from the Chroma Guide 
  • Sample Game Loop Level to showcase real-time effect manipulation 
  • Sample Chroma Animations in the Content\Animations folder 

   

Code Modules:

ChromaSDKPlugin : Runtime Plugin  

  

Number of Blueprints: 5 Widget Blueprints, 4 levels with Level Blueprints 

Number of C++ Classes: 9 plugin class headers, 7 sample code headers

Network Replicated: (Yes/No) No, Not Applicable

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 32-bit and Windows 64-bit 

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 32-bit and Windows 64-bit 

Documentation:

Documentation - Chroma RGB SDK: Empower Next-Level RGB Immersion with Dynamic Lighting

Example Project:

Unreal_ChromaSDK_Unicode_Example_Project-UE5.2.zip

Important/Additional Notes: 

Chroma SDK is compatible with all Unreal Engine versions from 4.21 through to 5.4
